about_the_game:
Ocean Otter Climb is a 2D platformer game about climbing to great heights.
An otter has fallen into the deep sea, where someone has drained all the water!
Now, the otter must make its way back to the surface.

Jump from platform to platform and escape the depths of the ocean.

You can soak in water to fill your water pouch!
Use the water as a booster to reach higher and farther platforms.

Can the otter safely return to the surface?
Start your challenge now!
detailed_description:
Ocean Otter Climb is a 2D platformer game about climbing to great heights.
An otter has fallen into the deep sea, where someone has drained all the water!
Now, the otter must make its way back to the surface.

Jump from platform to platform and escape the depths of the ocean.

You can soak in water to fill your water pouch!
Use the water as a booster to reach higher and farther platforms.

Can the otter safely return to the surface?
Start your challenge now!
name: Ocean Otter Climb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Ocean Otter Climb is a 2D platformer game about climbing to great heights. Let's climb With CUTE SEA OTTER!
